name: FNF 2 Players
description:
Let's play FNF in 2 players!

Work in progress!

Yes, you can play it from your mobile or tablet too!

This is a FAN-MADE game. All the rights for the idea, arts, and sounds go to the creator of the original Friday Night Funkin' game, ninjamuffin99, PhantomArcade3K, Evilsk8r, Kawaisprite.

Pick a friend and choose your favorite character from Friday Night Funkin' to play with!

As I said, this is a WIP (Work In Progress), and I will add new features soon, improving the game, fixing bugs, etc.

The game:

  • 2 mods: 1 player and 2 players
  • Fullscreen, Pause, Back, Mute buttons
  • Score
  • FPS
  • mobile-friendly

The single-player mode:

  • 4 Weeks: Dad, SkidPump, Pico, and Mom
  • Difficulty: Easy
  • 4 Songs: Bopeebo, Pico, Spookeez, Satin Panties

The 2-player mode:

  • Choose from 7 characters: Boyfriend, Pico, Dad, SkidPump, Girlfriend, Tankman, Mom
  • Random songs from Bopeebo, Pico, Spookeez, Satin Panties
  • 5 Difficulties: Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane, and ?!?!?#!?

When you will play the game from a mobile device, notice that at the bottom of the screen you will have some arrow controls. Use them to play. Seriously. 

Have fun! :) 

PS: Don't be rude in the comment section or I will need to close it.
